notesStmt.note: CAO-E, CAO-F and CAO-L have a slightly different melody from the other sources

rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-R CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody: Loquebantur variis linguis apostoli alleluia Loquebantur variis linguis apostoli magnalia dei prout spiritus sanctus dabat eloqui illis alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-R CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody: Repleti sunt omnes spiritu sancto et coeperunt loqui
